amendment.description: To authorize the Secretary of Veterans Affairs to enter into an enhanced-use lease at the Charleston Department of Veterans Affairs Medical Center, Charleston, South Carolina.

vote.text: Amendment SA 2172 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 2172 proposed by Senator Bond for Senator Graham SC to Amendment SA 2150. (consideration: CR S14507; text: CR S14507) To authorize the Secretary of Veterans Affairs to enter into an enhanced-use lease at the Charleston Department of Veterans Affairs Medical Center, Charleston, South Carolina.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 2172 proposed by Senator Bond for Senator Graham SC to Amendment SA 2150.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 2172 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
